cases.note: string-interpolation/query/non-empty template string with no expressions
string-interpolation/query/template string with var and ref expressions

result.description: true if `x` is not equal to `y`; false otherwise
result.name: result

cases.query: x = $"{[x | x := input.xs[_]]} {{y | y := input.ys[_]}} {{$"{x}-{y}": y | x := input.xs[_]; y := input.ys[_]}}"
